description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in LambertGroup HTML5 Radio Player - WPBakery Page Builder Addon allows Path Traversal. This issue affects HTML5 Radio Player - WPBakery Page Builder Addon: from n/a through 2.5.

product.name: HTML5 Radio Player - WPBakery Page Builder Addon
